#### Request Information
PWGSC, on behalf of the Department of the Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), is inviting proposals for the acquisition of one steam sterilizer autoclave located in Newfoundland and Labrador. The sterilizer equipment and its accessories are detailed in the Statement of Requirement, attached to this notice.

The proposed contract duration is from the award date until all deliverables are received. This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to Bidders from eligible countries.

All proposals must be submitted electronically through the supplied link [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19529905?extsite=MTk1Mjk5MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19529905?extsite=MTk1Mjk5MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) to be received by the specified Closing Date and time.
